title: Episode 7: Blaming the Victim and other Biases
description:
Are rape victims responsible for what happens to them? That is the question we examine this week. We look at blaming the victim and other attributional biases.

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
content:encoded: Are rape victims responsible for what happens to them? That is the question we examine this week. We look at blaming the victim and other attributional biases. Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
itunes:subtitle: Let's get a better understanding of the concept of blarming the victim and how it applies to rape and acquaintance rape situations. Are victims really to blame?
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
itunes:author: Michael Britt
